Package net.silthus.schat.pointer

Interface Configured

All Superinterfaces:
Pointered
All Known Subinterfaces:
Channel, Configurable<T>, Message
public interface Configured extends Pointered
Something that can retrieve a Setting from Settings.

next

      If this configured object is unable to provide a value for setting, the defaultValue will be returned.
